title: Landing The Big Client
headline: Landing The Big Client
subtitle: The VIP Contract
content:
Partnering with Franklin Clinton’s “celebrity solutions agency” will give you the opportunity to land a big-ticket, high-profile client, Dr. Dre.

As you make headway with the investigation, you’ll discover new songs from the six-time Grammy Award-winning hip-hop legend, all premiering exclusively in GTA Online.

Completing all missions the first time as leader will earn you Pause Menu Awards of GTA$700,000 on top of a hefty sum of GTA$1,000,000 for completing the VIP Contract as leader.
